attributes.action: Increase the school start age from 5 to 6 as of Sept 2021.
attributes.additional_details: This will be for the mental/educational well-being of all children, particularly for the vulnerable who will definitely have been effected by lack of/reduced learning for almost a year!
attributes.background: By increasing the school start age from 5 to 6, all children under the current circumstances will repeat their current school year, so that they can bridge the education that they have missed. Also for the missed transition to secondary school, SATS, early years transition.
